message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. Given its value and features, I'm initially pricing it at $14,000.  I'm confident it can significantly benefit you.
I'm interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't go as low as $10,500.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $12,250?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'd be willing to go up to $11,500, but that's as high as I can go
